citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 52A of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 â€“

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1989, No. 199 by inserting in Schedule 2 to that proclamation after the item relating to Mornington Road the following item:
        Electra Place - west side  0.43
                                       
        
            (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    30 October 2000

    G. S. M. GREEN

    Governor

    By His Excellency's Command,

    P. A. LENNON

    Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 8 November 2000

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
